00005 template<class Tsrc>
00006 class FFT2D
00007 {
00008 public:
00009         FIBITMAP*               TransformStandardToComplexImage(FIBITMAP *src, int inverse, int shift);
00010 };

00013 // Do FFT for type X
00014 FFT2D<unsigned char>            scaleUCharImage;
00015 FFT2D<unsigned short>           scaleUShortImage;
00016 FFT2D<short>                            scaleShortImage;
00017 FFT2D<unsigned long>            scaleULongImage;
00018 FFT2D<long>                                     scaleLongImage;
00019 FFT2D<float>                            scaleFloatImage;
00020 FFT2D<double>                           scaleDoubleImage;
00021 
00022 static void GetAbsoluteXValues(kiss_fft_cpx* fftbuf, double *out_values, int size)
00023 {
00024         int x;
00025 
00026         for(x=0; x < size; x++) {
00027                                 
00028                 *(out_values + x) = (double) sqrt(pow( (double)((fftbuf + x)->r), (double) 2.0) + 
00029                                                                                   pow( (double) ((fftbuf + x)->i), (double) 2.0));
00030                                   
00031         }
00032 }
00033 
00034 static void GetAbsoluteShiftedXValues(kiss_fft_cpx* fftbuf, double *out_values, int size)
00035 {
00036         int x, xhalf = size / 2;
00037 
00038         for(x=0; x < xhalf; x++) {
00039                                 
00040                 *(out_values + x + xhalf) = (double) sqrt(pow( (double)((fftbuf + x)->r), (double) 2.0) + 
00041                                                                                   pow( (double) ((fftbuf + x)->i), (double) 2.0));
00042                                   
00043         }
00044 
00045         for(x=xhalf; x < size; x++) {
00046                                 
00047                 *(out_values + x - xhalf) = (double) sqrt(pow( (double)((fftbuf + x)->r), (double) 2.0) + 
00048                                                                                   pow( (double) ((fftbuf + x)->i), (double) 2.0));
00049         }
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 static void GetShiftedComplexXValues(kiss_fft_cpx* fftbuf, FICOMPLEX *out_values, int size)
00054 {
00055         int x, xhalf = size / 2;
00056 
00057         for(x=0; x < xhalf; x++) {
00058                                 
00059                 (out_values + x + xhalf)->r = (double)((fftbuf + x)->r);
00060                 (out_values + x + xhalf)->i = (double)((fftbuf + x)->i);                          
00061         }
00062 
00063         for(x=xhalf; x < size; x++) {
00064                                 
00065                 (out_values + x - xhalf)->r = (double)((fftbuf + x)->r); 
00066                 (out_values + x - xhalf)->i = (double)((fftbuf + x)->i); 
00067         }
00068 }
00069 
00070 template<class Tsrc> FIBITMAP* 
00071 FFT2D<Tsrc>::TransformStandardToComplexImage(FIBITMAP *src, int inverse, int shift)
00072 {
00073         int height, width;
00074 
00075         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE src_type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00076 
00077         int i=0, x, y;
00078         int dims[2];
00079         int ndims = 2;
00080         Tsrc *bits; 
00081         FICOMPLEX *outbits;
00082         FIBITMAP *dst = NULL;
00083         
00084         kiss_fftnd_cfg st;
00085         kiss_fft_cpx* fftbuf;
00086         kiss_fft_cpx* fftoutbuf;
00087 
00088         // dims needs to be {rows, cols}, if you have contiguous rows.
00089         dims[0] = height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00090         dims[1] = width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00091         
00092         fftbuf = (kiss_fft_cpx*) malloc( width * height * sizeof(kiss_fft_cpx) );
00093         fftoutbuf = (kiss_fft_cpx*) malloc( width * height * sizeof(kiss_fft_cpx) ); 
00094         
00095         st = kiss_fftnd_alloc (dims, ndims, inverse, 0, 0);
00096 
00097         
00098         for(y = height - 1; y >= 0; y--) { 
00099                 
00100                 bits = (Tsrc *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y);
00101                 
00102                 for(x=0; x < width; x++) {
00103                 
00104                         fftbuf[i].r = (float) bits[x];
00105                     fftbuf[i].i = 0.0;
00106                  
00107                     i++;
00108                 }
00109         }
00110 
00111         kiss_fftnd(st, fftbuf, fftoutbuf);
00112 
00113         if ( (dst = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_COMPLEX, width, height, 32, 0, 0, 0)) == NULL )
00114                 return NULL;
00115 
00116         if(shift >= 1) {
00117 
00118                 int yhalf = height / 2;
00119 
00120                 for(y = yhalf - 1; y >= 0; y--) { 
00121                 
00122                         outbits = (FICOMPLEX *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dst, y);
00123 
00124                         GetShiftedComplexXValues(fftoutbuf, outbits, width);
00125         
00126                         fftoutbuf += width;
00127                 }
00128 
00129                 for(y = height -1; y >= yhalf; y--) { 
00130                 
00131                         outbits = (FICOMPLEX *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dst, y);
00132 
00133                         GetShiftedComplexXValues(fftoutbuf, outbits, width);
00134         
00135                         fftoutbuf += width;
00136                 }
00137         }
00138         else {
00139 
00140                 for(y = height - 1; y >= 0; y--) { 
00141                 
00142                         outbits = (FICOMPLEX *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dst, y);
00143 
00144                         for(x=0; x < width; x++) {
00145                                 
00146                                 (outbits + x)->r = (double)((fftoutbuf + x)->r);
00147                                 (outbits + x)->i = (double)((fftoutbuf + x)->i);          
00148                         }
00149 
00150                         fftoutbuf += width;
00151                 }
00152 
00153         }
00154 
00155         free(st);
00156 
00157         return dst;
00158 }

00161 static FIBITMAP* 
00162 TransformComplexToComplexImage(FIBITMAP *src, int inverse, int shift)
00163 {
00164         int height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00165         int width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00166         int i=0, x, y;
00167         int dims[2];
00168         int ndims = 2;
00169         FICOMPLEX *bits; 
00170         FICOMPLEX *outbits;
00171         FIBITMAP *dst = NULL;
00172         
00173         kiss_fftnd_cfg st;
00174         kiss_fft_cpx* fftbuf;
00175         kiss_fft_cpx* fftoutbuf;
00176 
00177         // dims needs to be rows, cols, if you have contiguous rows)
00178         dims[0] = height;
00179         dims[1] = width;
00180         
00181         fftbuf = (kiss_fft_cpx*) malloc( width * height * sizeof(kiss_fft_cpx) );
00182         fftoutbuf = (kiss_fft_cpx*) malloc( width * height * sizeof(kiss_fft_cpx) ); 
00183         
00184         st = kiss_fftnd_alloc (dims, ndims, inverse, 0, 0);
00185 
00186         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00187                 
00188                 bits = (FICOMPLEX *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y);
00189                 
00190                 for(x=0; x < width; x++) {
00191                 
00192                         fftbuf[i].r = (float) bits[x].r;
00193                     fftbuf[i].i = (float) bits[x].i;
00194                     
00195                     i++;
00196                 }
00197         }
00198 
00199         kiss_fftnd(st, fftbuf, fftoutbuf);
00200 
00201         if ( (dst = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_COMPLEX, width, height, 32, 0, 0, 0)) == NULL )
00202                 return NULL;
00203 
00204         if(shift >= 1) {
00205 
00206                 int yhalf = height / 2;
00207 
00208                 for(y = yhalf; y < height; y++) { 
00209                 
00210                         outbits = (FICOMPLEX *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dst, y);
00211 
00212                         GetShiftedComplexXValues(fftoutbuf, outbits, width);
00213         
00214                         fftoutbuf += width;
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 for(y = 0; y < yhalf; y++) { 
00218                 
00219                         outbits = (FICOMPLEX *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dst, y);
00220 
00221                         GetShiftedComplexXValues(fftoutbuf, outbits, width);
00222         
00223                         fftoutbuf += width;
00224                 }
00225         }
00226         else {
00227 
00228                 for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00229                 
00230                         outbits = (FICOMPLEX *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dst, y);
00231 
00232                         for(x=0; x < width; x++) {
00233                                 
00234                                 (outbits + x)->r = (double)((fftoutbuf + x)->r);
00235                                 (outbits + x)->i = (double)((fftoutbuf + x)->i);          
00236                         }
00237 
00238                         fftoutbuf += width;
00239                 }
00240 
00241         }
00242 
00243         free(st);
00244 
00245         return dst;
00246 }

00338 
00339 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00340 FreeImageAlgorithms_FFT(FIBITMAP *src, int inverse, int shift)
00341 {
00342         if(!src)
00343                 return NULL;
00344 
00345         // convert from src_type to FIT_BITMAP
00346 
00347         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE src_type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00348 
00349         switch(src_type) {
00350 
00351                 case FIT_BITMAP:        // standard image: 1-, 4-, 8-, 16-, 24-, 32-bit
00352                         if(FreeImage_GetBPP(src) == 8)
00353                                 return scaleUCharImage.TransformStandardToComplexImage(src, inverse, shift);                            
00354 
00355                 case FIT_UINT16:        // array of unsigned short: unsigned 16-bit
00356                         return scaleUShortImage.TransformStandardToComplexImage(src, inverse, shift);
00357         
00358                 case FIT_INT16:         // array of short: signed 16-bit
00359                         return scaleShortImage.TransformStandardToComplexImage(src, inverse, shift);
00360                 
00361                 case FIT_UINT32:        // array of unsigned long: unsigned 32-bit
00362                         return scaleULongImage.TransformStandardToComplexImage(src, inverse, shift);
00363                 
00364                 case FIT_INT32:         // array of long: signed 32-bit
00365                         return scaleLongImage.TransformStandardToComplexImage(src, inverse, shift);
00366                 
00367                 case FIT_FLOAT:         // array of float: 32-bit
00368                         return scaleFloatImage.TransformStandardToComplexImage(src, inverse, shift);
00369                 
00370                 case FIT_DOUBLE:        // array of double: 64-bit
00371                         return scaleDoubleImage.TransformStandardToComplexImage(src, inverse, shift);
00372                         
00373                 case FIT_COMPLEX:       // array of FICOMPLEX: 2 x 64-bit
00374                         return TransformComplexToComplexImage(src, inverse, shift);
00375         }
00376 
00377         FreeImage_OutputMessageProc(FIF_UNKNOWN, "FREE_IMAGE_TYPE: Unable to perform FFT for type %d.", src_type);
00378 
00379         return NULL;
00380 }
00381 
00382 
00383 
00384 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00385 FreeImageAlgorithms_ConvertComplexImageToAbsoluteValued(FIBITMAP *src)
00386 {
00387         FIBITMAP *dst = NULL;
00388         unsigned x, y;
00389                                                 
00390         unsigned width  = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00391         unsigned height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00392 
00393         // allocate a 8-bit dib
00394         dst = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_DOUBLE, width, height, 32, 0, 0, 0);
00395         
00396         if(!dst)
00397                 return NULL;
00398 
00399         FICOMPLEX *src_bits;    
00400         double    *dst_bits; 
00401 
00402         for(y = 0; y < height; y++) { 
00403                 
00404                 src_bits = (FICOMPLEX *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y);
00405                 dst_bits = (double *) FreeImage_GetScanLine(dst, y);
00406 
00407                 for(x=0; x < width; x++) {
00408                                 
00409                         *(dst_bits + x) = (double) sqrt(pow( (double)((src_bits + x)->r), (double) 2.0) + 
00410                                                                                 pow( (double)((src_bits + x)->i), (double) 2.0));
00411                 
00412                 }
00413         }
00414 
00415         return dst;
00416 }
